meanings.definition: A person who achieves success or reaches a goal.
meanings.sent1: The achievers in our class received certificates for their hard work.
meanings.sent2: The achievers in the competition were awarded medals for their outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The achievers at the marathon celebrated by eating a giant cake together.
meanings.sent4: The achievers in the business world are like shining stars in the sky, guiding others with their success.
meanings.sent5: The achievers in history books inspire us to dream big and work hard towards our goals.

meanings.definition: Those who accomplish something noteworthy or significant.
meanings.sent1: The achievers in the science fair presented their innovative projects to the judges.
meanings.sent2: The achievers in the community were recognized for their contributions to society.
meanings.sent3: The achievers at the talent show surprised everyone with their unexpected talents.
meanings.sent4: The achievers in the art world paint a colorful picture of creativity and passion.
meanings.sent5: The achievers in sports history have left a lasting legacy for future generations to admire.
